artist: After a crayon by Heinrich Lossow
description: green-toned bedroom scene of a young woman, partly dressed in fancy, flowing garmets leaning against her vanity and preening in a mirror while holding a powder puff to her chin; a curtain is drawn from an unmade bed with a large pillow behind her; her unlaced, high-heeled boots are in the foreground
title: Overslept Herself
